Title: Trump Made $300,000 for Endorsing Bible, Financial Disclosure Shows
ADX Keywords: United States Politics and Government;Presidential Election of 2024;Bible;Royalties;Nonfungible Tokens (NFTs);Trump, Donald J;Trump, Melania
Abstract: Donald J. Trump also listed $100 million in liabilities over judgments he owes in civil cases, and over $1 million in crypto holdings as he courts the industry for his campaign.
